title: Virgin Galactic looks ahead to future spaceplanes as it gears up for return to space
summary: As Virgin Galactic prepares to finally begin commercial flights, the company is providing new details about how its next generation of vehicles can put the company on a path to profitability.

title: China prepares resupply mission, lands space plane, and readies methane rocket
summary: China plans to continue its ongoing supply chain for the Tiangong Space Station (TSS) by launching the Tianzhou-6 mission. The launch is scheduled for 13:25 UTC on May 10 and will launch a Tianzhou capsule on top of a Chang Zheng 7 (Long March 7).

title: Rocket Lab revenue increases slightly, company adds NASA launch contract
summary: Rocket Lab’s revenue increased slightly in the first quarter, but losses grew as well, as the spacecraft and launch company added a NASA contract and continued to invest in its future Neutron vehicle.

title: Florida-based intercity rail service adopts Starlink
summary: Brightline said it has become the first passenger rail company to offer Starlink satellite broadband, which it plans to deploy on a total 10 trains connecting cities across parts of Florida this summer.

title: Virgin Galactic quarterly loss widens while company preps for spaceflight return this month
summary: Virgin Galactic is aiming to fly its first spaceflight in nearly two years later this month, but the company’s first quarter loss widened dramatically as it funds its fleet growth.
